text:
Just a quick not to tell I have tested RendezView. I really liked the 2D canvas where you can spatially organize your meeting artifacts: editable docs, sheets and slides (from Google), videos (based on Jitsi), and also shared screens.

I can imagine someone can set some kind of "rooms" or spatially collocated stuff based on subjects.
